title: Facebook: The social media rebound is heating up
text: Shares of social media juggernaut Facebook are now up 36% so far in 2019, erasing the steep losses suffered last year.

title: It's Not Just Politicians Anymore: Shareholders Call for Facebook Breakup
text: But Mark Zuckerberg will easily vote down the shareholder proposal.

title: EU countries back copyright overhaul that threatens to hit YouTube and Facebook
text: The legislation has been criticized by the likes of Google and internet freedom campaigners who worry it will result in censorship.
